ygData.subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 184
ygData.msgSnippet: Yup, and I can t wait until I have it trained to reliable, and one of those usefull situations comes up  :) Sister SHelza. ...
ygData.messageBody:
Yup, and I can't wait until I have it trained to reliable, and one of those
usefull situations comes up :)

Sister SHelza.

>From: Rourke <rourkfam@...>
>Reply-To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>To: EQ-Monks@onelist.com
>Subject: Re: [EQ-Monks] Digest Number 184
>Date: Sun, 19 Mar 2000 13:01:52 -0500
>
> I don't know about personal experience, seeing how I haven't gotten ID
>yet (so close to 18), but I have seen it in action. I've seen a couple
>higher lvl monks solo a spectre very easily using ID, fearing it, then
>beating on its back. One monk of the karana server has claimed to solo
>a hill giant using it. (just can't remember the name) Though it is slow
>to increase I've heard that ID can be rather helpful in hte right
>situations.
>
>Zhanjin
>Innoruuk
>
